en: And We have enjoined upon man [care] for his parents.
And We have enjoined upon man [care] for his parents.
His mother carried him, [increasing her] in weakness upon weakness,
and his weaning is in two years.
Be grateful to Me and to your parents;

ar: وَإِن جَـٰهَدَاكَ عَلَىٰٓ أَن تُشْرِكَ بِى
en: But if they endeavor to make you associate with Me
that of which you have no knowledge,
but accompany them in [this] world with appropriate kindness
and follow the way of those who turn back to Me [in repentance].
Then to Me will be your return,
and I will inform you about what you used to do.
